text: Stefano Lari (born 15 April 1961) is an Italian rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Italy Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Stefano Lari
